LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: Convert CSV to Records - LWC version
LightningComponentBundle.description: This will make the parsing on the client side and not on the APEX side

property.name: delimiter
property.label: Delimiter
property.description: The delimiting character. Leave blank to auto-detect from a list of most common delimiters, or any values passed in through delimitersToGuess

property.name: newline
property.label: Newline
property.description: The newline sequence. Leave blank to auto-detect. Must be one of \r, \n, or \r\n.

property.name: quoteChar
property.label: Quote Character
property.description: The character used to quote fields. The quoting of all fields is not mandatory. Any field which is not quoted will correctly read.

property.name: escapeChar
property.label: Escape Character
property.description: The character used to escape the quote character within a field. If not set, this option will default to the value of quoteChar

property.name: transformHeader
property.label: Transform Header
property.description: A function to apply on each header. Requires header to be true. The function receives the header as its first argument and the index as second.

property.name: dynamicTyping
property.label: Dynamic Typing
property.description: If true, numeric and boolean data will be converted to their type instead of remaining strings.

property.name: encoding
property.label: Encoding
property.description: The encoding to use when opening local files. If specified, it must be a value supported by the FileReader API.

property.name: comments
property.label: Comments
property.description: A string that indicates a comment (for example, # or //). When Papa encounters a line starting with this string, it will skip the line.

property.name: fastMode
property.label: Fast Mode
property.description: Fast mode speeds up parsing significantly for large inputs. However, it only works when the input has no quoted fields. Fast mode will automatically be enabled if no " characters appear in the input.

property.name: transform
property.label: Transform
property.description: A function to apply on each value. The function receives the value as its first argument and the column number or header name when enabled as its second argument. The return value of the function will replace the value it received. The transform function is applied before dynamicTyping.

property.name: delimitersToGuess
property.label: Delimiters To Guess
property.description: An array of delimiters to guess from if the delimiter option is not set.

property.name: inputLabel
property.label: Input Label
property.description: The label for the input field

property.name: autoNavigateNext
property.label: Auto Navigate Next
property.description: If true, the flow will automatically navigate to the next screen after the component has been initialized.

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Output Object
propertyType.description: Generic sObject data type used for output sObject properties
